scripts.copy:dist: cpx manifest.json dist/ && cpx versions.json dist/ && cpx styles.css dist/ || exit 0
scripts.release: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../obsidian-ast.zip .
scripts.build:test: rm -rf build-tests && tsc --project tsconfig.test.json && echo '{"type":"commonjs"}' > build-tests/package.json
